name: Matthews International Corporation
description: Matthews International Corporation is a leading provider of memorialization and industrial products and services. Founded in 1850 and headquartered in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania, the company operates through two primary segments: Memorialization and Industrial. The Memorialization segment includes a wide range of products and services, such as cemetery memorials, cremation equipment, and related services that help families honor their loved ones. Matthews is recognized for its quality craftsmanship and innovation in the memorialization industry, including custom designs and advanced technology for memorial products. The Industrial segment focuses on providing marking and coding solutions, including equipment and consumables for product identification and traceability, serving various industries such as food and beverage, pharmaceuticals, and consumer goods. Matthews has established a strong reputation for delivering high-quality products and services while maintaining a commitment to customer satisfaction and sustainability. The company continues to expand its global footprint, investing in technology and innovation to enhance its offerings and operational efficiency. With a rich heritage of over 170 years, Matthews International is dedicated to helping customers commemorate lives and improve industrial processes.
